com.hazelcast.internal.memory

Interface ConcurrentHeapMemoryAccessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ByteAccessStrategy<Object>, HeapMemoryAccessor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GlobalMemoryAccessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlignmentAwareMemoryAccessor, StandardMemoryAccessor

    public interface ConcurrentHeapMemoryAccessor
extends HeapMemoryAccessor
    Extends HeapMemoryAccessor with concurrent operations.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.hazelcast.internal.memory.HeapMemoryAccessor

        ARRAY_BOOLEAN_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_BOOLEAN_INDEX_SCALE, ARRAY_BYTE_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_BYTE_INDEX_SCALE, ARRAY_CHAR_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_CHAR_INDEX_SCALE, ARRAY_DOUBLE_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_DOUBLE_INDEX_SCALE, ARRAY_FLOAT_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_FLOAT_INDEX_SCALE, ARRAY_INT_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_INT_INDEX_SCALE, ARRAY_LONG_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_LONG_INDEX_SCALE, ARRAY_OBJECT_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_OBJECT_INDEX_SCALE, ARRAY_SHORT_BASE_OFFSET, ARRAY_SHORT_INDEX_SCALE

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean compareAndSwapInt(Object base, long offset, int expected, int x)
      Compares and swaps an int value to an expected value atomically based by given object with given offset, if and only if its current value is equal to the expected value.
      boolean compareAndSwapLong(Object base, long offset, long expected, long x)
      Compares and swaps a long value to an expected value atomically based by given object with given offset if and only if its current value equals to the expected value.
      boolean compareAndSwapObject(Object base, long offset, Object expected, Object x)
      Compares and swaps referenced object to expected object atomically based by given owner object at given offset if and only if its current object is the expected object.

      • getBooleanVolatile

        boolean getBooleanVolatile(Object base,
                         long offset)
        Reads the boolean value as volatile from given object by its offset.
        Parameters:
        base - the object where boolean value will be read from
        offset - offset from object's base to the accessed location
        Returns:
        the boolean value that was read

                       long offset)

        Returns:
        the retrieved referenced object

      • putObjectVolatile

                     long offset,
                     Object x)
        Puts the referenced object to given owner object as volatile by its offset.
        Parameters:
        base - the owner object where the referenced object will be written to
        offset - offset from object's base to the accessed location
        x - the referenced object to be written

      • compareAndSwapInt

        boolean compareAndSwapInt(Object base,
                        long offset,
                        int expected,
                        int x)
        Compares and swaps an int value to an expected value atomically based by given object with given offset, if and only if its current value is equal to the expected value.
        Parameters:
        base - the object where int value will be written to
        offset - offset from object's base to the accessed location
        expected - the expected current int value to be set new int value
        x - the int value to be written
        Returns:
        true if CAS is successful, false otherwise

      • compareAndSwapLong

        boolean compareAndSwapLong(Object base,
                         long offset,
                         long expected,
                         long x)
        Compares and swaps a long value to an expected value atomically based by given object with given offset if and only if its current value equals to the expected value.
        Parameters:
        base - the object where long value will be written to
        offset - offset from object's base to the accessed location
        expected - the expected current long value to be set new long value
        x - the long value to be written
        Returns:
        true if CAS is successful, false otherwise

      • compareAndSwapObject

        boolean compareAndSwapObject(Object base,
                           long offset,
                           Object expected,
                           Object x)
        Compares and swaps referenced object to expected object atomically based by given owner object at given offset if and only if its current object is the expected object.
        Parameters:
        base - the owner object where the referenced object will be written to
        offset - offset from object's base to the accessed location
        expected - the expected current referenced object to be set to new referenced object
        x - the new referenced object that will be written
        Returns:
        true if CAS is successful, false otherwise

      • putOrderedInt

        void putOrderedInt(Object base,
                 long offset,
                 int x)
        Puts the given int value as ordered to the CPU write buffer based by the given object at the given offset.
        Parameters:
        base - the object where the int value will be written to
        offset - offset from object's base to the accessed location
        x - the int value to be written

      • putOrderedLong

        void putOrderedLong(Object base,
                  long offset,
                  long x)
        Puts the given long value as ordered to the CPU write buffer based by the given object at the given offset.
        Parameters:
        base - the object where the long value will be written to
        offset - offset from object's base to the accessed location
        x - the long value to be written

      • putOrderedObject

        void putOrderedObject(Object base,
                    long offset,
                    Object x)
        Puts the given referenced object as ordered to the CPU write buffer based by the given owner object at the given offset.
        Parameters:
        base - the owner object where the referenced object will be written to
        offset - offset from object's base to the accessed location
        x - the referenced object to be written
